meanings.definition: A person who is regarded as unsophisticated or lacking in social graces.
meanings.sent1: The gombeens at the party stood quietly in the corner, unsure of how to join the conversation.
meanings.sent2: She always felt out of place at fancy events, surrounded by gombeens who didn't understand her interests.
meanings.sent3: The gombeens tried to use the fancy cutlery, but ended up making a mess at the dinner table.
meanings.sent4: In a world of elegance and sophistication, he felt like a gombeen in a ballroom full of dancers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gombeens stumbling over their words left a lasting impression on the guests.

meanings.definition: A small-time, unscrupulous businessman or politician.
meanings.sent1: The town was tired of the gombeens who promised much but delivered little in return.
meanings.sent2: He was known as a gombeen in the business world, always looking for shortcuts to make a profit.
meanings.sent3: The gombeens tried to cut corners, but their schemes always ended in disaster.
meanings.sent4: Like a gombeen in a suit, he tried to deceive the public with false promises and empty words.
meanings.sent5: The gombeens in the political arena were like shadows, lurking in the background of every deal.
